title: Bug 6304: Cannot sync a .java file and another resource
OB: When I select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer, the context menu does not contain the 'Team' entry.
EB: I expect the context menu to include the 'Team' entry when I select a .java file and another resource in the package viewer.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Select a .java file and another resource (such as a .properties file) in the package viewer.
2. Verify that the 'Team' entry is missing from the context menu.
